name: JimmyQuest
summary:
It is a morning unlike any other, for today Hajime "Jimmy" Lara is going to do something she has never(?) done before — take a big CHOMP out of Junta's tail!

Hajime "Jimmy" Lara and Junta are two beautiful cats who live together in a little house with two weird humans. But who cares about humans? Jimmy has her eyes on one target, and it's that enticing, twitchy, wriggly-wiggly tail sprouting out of Junta's butt.

The story will involve a brief introduction to Ms. Jimmy and Mr. Junta before she spends her hours honing her skills to pull off the perfect crime.

Bolster her STEALTH, ROUMB, CUTE, and BITE stats to ensure that she achieves her almighty goal!

And if you win...long live Queen Jim!
